trans-unit.source: The abstract base class that represents a binding terminal that supports the flow of data into and out of an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe base abstrata que representa um terminal de associação com suporte para o fluxo de dados de entrada e de saída de um <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection" /> that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" /> represents the flow of data into an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />, out of an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />, or both into and out of an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma <see cref="T:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection" /> que especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" /> representa o fluxo de dados de entrada em um <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />, de saída de um <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" /> ou de entrada e de saída de um <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the direction of the flow of data through the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que especifica a direção do fluxo de dados por meio do <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the argument using the specified activity context.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor do argumento usando o contexto de atividade especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Location" /> of the value referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Location" /> do valor referenciado pelo <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.

trans-unit.source: The location of the value referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: O local do valor referenciado pelo <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string value used by <see cref="P:System.Activities.DelegateArgument.Name" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de cadeia de caracteres usado pelo <see cref="P:System.Activities.DelegateArgument.Name" />.
